mapper.select: SELECT TBCI.ID, TBCI.CALENDAR_INVITE_INVITED_MEMBER_ID, TBCI.CALENDAR_INVITE_HOST_ID, TBCI.CALENDAR_ID, TBC.CALENDAR_TITLE FROM TBL_CALENDAR_INVITE TBCI JOIN TBL_CALENDAR TBC ON TBCI.CALENDAR_ID = TBC.ID WHERE TBCI.CALENDAR_INVITE_INVITED_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND TBCI.CALENDAR_INVITE_IS_APPROVED = 0
